product_name: Sherpani Milli LE Cross-Body Bag - Women's
long_description: The women's Sherpani Milli LE Cross-Body Bag carries the stuff you need in its generous main pocket and handily organizes smaller items, all in a high-quality and eye-catching design. Deep zippered main compartment is sized to accommodate an e-reader; front-flap has magnetic closure. 2 external zippered pockets; 1 external mesh pocket for a water bottle. Key clip; detachable change purse; pen holders. Adjustable shoulder strap. Sherpani Milli LE Cross-Body Bag features water-resistant, silicone-coated nylon paneling with an embroidered pattern.
short_description: The women's Sherpani Milli LE Cross-Body Bag carries the stuff you need in its generous main pocket and handily organizes smaller items, all in a high-quality and eye-catching design.
